title: F/S Couple of T206 HOF's PSA SOLD!!!
author: t206hof

posts.post_title: F/S Couple of T206 HOF's PSA SOLD!!!
posts.post_content: I have a PSA 3 Hughie Jennings Portrait Piedmont 150 Back. Also, a Waddell Portrait PSA 4 with Sweet Caporal 150 Back. Ill take $105 for the Jenning and $190 for the Waddell. PM if interested. Paypal gift is ok. Both SOLD!!
